doc.title: It's Your World
doc.plot: The next twenty years are critical if the planet is to avoid the worst consequences of Global Warming and post-Peak Oil. Brent Nelson, from the National Renewable Energy Lab (NREL), asks students at the Colorado School of Mines what our energy future should be. The discussion provides insights to technical issues and promising solutions but also reveals the dire lack of world leadership or even a U.S. energy plan.
